TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Michael_Adams, title = Michael_Adams, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Adams} }

S.FORM: Michael Adams tatama, nalecuhan i 19 bulad 1 a demiad, 1963 a mihcaan, Michael Adams, miunduay. Michael Adams unu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u misimaw zikuzay mimaliay. Michael Adams i 1985 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 3 ku uwac atu silsil 66, namapili' tu nu Sacramento Kings putiput.

Michael Adams tatama, nalecohan i 19 bolad 1 a demiad, 1963 a mihcaan, Michael Adams, miondoay. Michael Adams ono syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, o misimaw zikozay mimaliay. Michael Adams i 1985 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 3 ko owac ato silsil 66, namapili' to no Sacramento Kings potipot.
